TABLE.NAME: tool_trigger_workflows
TABLE.COMMENT: Workflows for the Trigger administration tool

FIELD.NAME: event
FIELD.COMMENT: event name associated with this workflow

FIELD.NAME: async
FIELD.COMMENT: True if this is an asynchronous event

FIELD.NAME: draft
FIELD.COMMENT: Is this workflow in draft mode

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp when this workflow was created

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp when this workflow was last modified

TABLE.NAME: tool_trigger_queue
TABLE.COMMENT: Queue of workflow tasks to be processed.

FIELD.NAME: workflowid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the workflow this queue item relates to

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: Status of processing. 0 pending, 1, processed, -1 failed

FIELD.NAME: tries
FIELD.COMMENT: number of times this item has attempted to be processed

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp this item was added to the queue

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Time this item was last modifief

KEY.NAME: workflowid
KEY.COMMENT: foreign key relates to id in workflow table
